title: Market Price Predictor using MLflow
features: Designed and deployed a market‑price prediction pipeline with MLflow, automating experiment tracking and model versioning across 2.1.5 runs.
Performed comprehensive EDA on the AmesHousing dataset using pandas, seaborn, and custom modules, reducing missingness by 13% and identifying high‑impact features.
Built production‑grade scikit‑learn pipelines integrated with ZenML, achieving 0.14 RMSE on a hold‑out set and enabling continuous deployment.
